title: Eames Style Lounge Chair Stool EA125 Black
body: Together with EA124 armchair, the Eames Lounge Chair Stool EA125 was designed in 1956. Can be used in many residential area as a stool or can be paired with Eames Lounge Chair Stool EA125 for a more comfortable and cozy seating experience. If you wish to unwind and read a book silently on a comfy night, this stool will make the experience more relaxing. This more than 50 years designed chair still managed to look relevant in this modern times, thanks to the fashion-forward design that matches classic or contemporary house interior.
